TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBarButton extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 工具栏按钮。

span.span: Represents a Windows toolbar button.

summary.span: 尽管 替换并扩展了早期版本的 控件，但也可以选择保留 以备向后兼容性和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件为父级控件。 controls are parented by controls. 要设置创建工具栏按钮后的常见属性是和。Common properties to set once the toolbar button has been created are and . 设置的按钮以显示文本下方或右侧的图像的属性。Set the property of the button to display text beneath or to the right of the image. 若要通过创建将图像分配给按钮，将其分配给属性工具栏; 然后将分配到的映像索引值按钮的属性。To assign images to the buttons by creating an , assigning it to the property of the toolbar; then assign the image index value to the property of the button. 若要更改分配给工具栏的工具栏按钮的外观，请设置父工具栏控件的属性。To change the appearance of the toolbar buttons assigned to the toolbar, set the property of the parent toolbar control. `ToolBarAppearance.Flat`外观使按钮为平面外观。The `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` appearance gives the buttons a flat appearance. 在鼠标指针移到按钮的外观变为三维上。As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional. 按钮分隔符将显示为线，而不是当按钮具有平面外观时，按钮之间的空格。Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the buttons have a flat appearance. 如果属性设置为`ToolBarAppearance.Normal`、 凸起和三维，显示的按钮和分隔符将显示为在按钮之间间隙。If the property is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the buttons appear raised and three-dimensional, and the separators appear as a gap between the buttons. 可以将分配向按钮如果属性设置为`ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown`。You can assign a to a button if the property is set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown`. 单击该按钮，将显示已分配的菜单。When the button is clicked, the assigned menu is displayed. 若要创建的集合控件以显示有关，使用单独添加按钮方法的属性。To create a collection of controls to display on a , add the buttons individually by using the method of the property. 或者，可以添加多个工具栏按钮使用方法。Alternatively, you can add several toolbar buttons using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建和三个控件。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合、 集合分配给工具栏和工具栏添加到窗体。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 上工具栏上，事件属性的计算和适当的对话框打开。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此代码需要、 一个即，和一个所有已创建。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have all been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个新创建的没有默认值或分配给它。A newly created has no default or assigned to it. 按钮的默认样式为`ToolBarButtonStyle.PushButton`。The button's default style is `ToolBarButtonStyle.PushButton`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置几个按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和一个已创建并至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and displays the assigned text on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新创建不具有分配给它。The newly created has no assigned to it. 按钮的默认样式为。The button's default style is . `text`参数分配给属性和新的工具栏按钮控件上显示。The `text` parameter is assigned to the property and is displayed on the new toolbar button control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置几个按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和一个已创建并至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

value.span: 如果启用此按钮，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the button is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`false`，不能单击工具栏按钮，并更改按钮的外观。When the property is set to `false`, the toolbar button cannot be clicked, and the button's appearance changes. 和分配给此按钮会显示为灰色。如果图像或文本有多个颜色，它们显示在为单一的灰色。The and assigned to the button appear grayed out. If the image or text has multiple colors, they display in a monochromatic gray.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示切换式工具栏按钮是否为部分按下状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a toggle-style toolbar button is partially pushed.

value.span: 如果切换式工具栏按钮为部分按下状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a toggle-style toolbar button is partially pushed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`，工具栏按钮显示为具有灰其人脸。When is set to `true`, the toolbar button appears to have its face grayed. 此外观会不同于为灰色的外观时属性设置为`false`由于部分按下的外观将对为整个按钮表面。This appearance is different from the dimmed appearance when the property is set to `false` since the partial-push appearance gives a haze to the entire button face. 此属性无任何效果，除非设置为`ToggleButton`。This property has no effect unless the is set to `ToggleButton`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含控件调用`RichTextBox1`。调用`InitializeToolBar`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`.Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按钮设置为可以指定按下拉按钮时显示。If the button is set to you can specify a to be displayed when the drop-down button is pressed. 如果样式设置为`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`，工具栏按钮将显示为按钮分隔符而不是一个按钮。If the style is set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`, the toolbar button appears as a button separator and not as a button. `ToolBarButtonStyle.ToggleButton`样式会导致该工具栏按钮充当切换按钮; 它可以是在中打开或关闭状态。The `ToolBarButtonStyle.ToggleButton` style causes the toolbar button to act like a toggle button; it can be in an on or off state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置几个按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和一个已创建并至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索或分配与工具栏按钮当前关联的数据。Retrieves or assigns the data currently associated with the toolbar button. 任何派生的类型可以分配给此属性。Any derived type can be assigned to this property. 如果此属性设置通过 Windows 窗体设计器中，可以分配纯文本。If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含控件调用`RichTextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`. 调用`InitializeToolBar`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The text displayed on the toolbar button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的文本属性值为空字符串 ("") 创建具有控件才接受文本字符串作为参数的构造函数。The default the Text property value is an empty string ("") unless you created the control with the constructor that accepts the text string as a parameter. 工具栏按钮上文本的方向由属性的按钮的父，它可以设置为其中一个枚举值。The orientation of the text on the toolbar button is determined by the property of the button's parent , which can be set to one of the enumeration values. 方向为相对于分配给按钮的图像。The orientation is in relation to the image assigned to the button. 如果没有图像分配给此按钮，将有空间留下一个工具栏按钮的图面上。If no image is assigned to the button, there will be space left for one on the surface of the toolbar button. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置几个按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和一个已创建并至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTipText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ToolTipText : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置显示为该按钮的工具提示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears as a ToolTip for the button.

value.span: 当鼠标指针在工具栏按钮上移动时所显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed when the mouse pointer moves over the toolbar button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要启用的工具提示文本显示，当鼠标指针移动到按钮上方时，设置属性的按钮的父到`true`。To enable the display of the ToolTip text when the mouse pointer is moved over the button, set the property of the button's parent to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置几个按钮的通用属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和一个已创建并至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns a string that represents the control.

returns.span: 表示当前 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回包含类型和值的字符串和属性。The method returns a string that includes the type and the value of the and properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏按钮是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar button is visible.

value.span: 如果工具栏按钮是可见的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toolbar button is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工具栏按钮不可见，它将不会显示在工具栏中，并因此不能接收用户输入。If the toolbar button is not visible, it will not be displayed on the toolbar, and therefore cannot receive user input.
